text: Tamagra rama'a naneke huta Anumzamofona azeri avesra nehaze. Nehuta inankna huta azeri avesra nehune? huta agenoka nehaze. Kefo avu'ava'ma nehaza vahe'mota huta, Ra Anumzamofo avurera tagra knare hu'nonankino, Agra muse hunerante hutama nehaza kemo'a, Ra Anumzamofona azeri avesra nehigeta, iga fatgo huno'ma refkoma nehia Anumzana mani'ne? huta agenoka nehaze.
